question: Is it true that the Prophet (SAW) said that men have been endowed with more akal (intellect) than women by Allah SWT? Also how does this relate to decision making b/n a married couple.
answer:
QUESTION
Can you also include the actual hadith please. Jazakallahu Khairan.
ANSWER


Share:
It is true that Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) has mentioned that%0D%0Awomen have less intelligence than men. This is recorded in Bukhari Shareef.%0D%0AAs far as decision making between husband and wife, the Shari'ah has made%0D%0Athe husband the head of the family. The wife has to obey his lawful demands.%0D%0AThis does not mean that he should not consult with her, or that she has no%0D%0Asay whatsoever in the family, but it means that time final authority lies%0D%0Awith the husband.%0D%0A%0D%0ARasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'I have not seen a person%0D%0Adeficient in intelligence and Deen more able to overcome an intelligent man%0D%0Athat you, O women. The women asked, 'What is the deficiency in our intellect%0D%0Aand Deen.' Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) replied, 'Is it not that%0D%0Ain testimony, your testimony is half of the man's.' They replied,%0D%0A'Certainly.' He (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'This is due to your%0D%0Adeficient intellect.'%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0AMufti Ebrahim Desai%0D%0AFATWA DEPT.%0D%0A%0D%0A
